results.adx_keywords: Airlines and Airplanes;Aviation Accidents, Safety and Disasters;Pilots;Airports;Cory Patterson;Walmart Stores Inc;Tupelo (Miss);Mississippi
results.title: Pilot Lands After Threatening to Crash Small Plane Into a Walmart
results.abstract: The pilot took a plane from a Tupelo, Miss., airport on Saturday and flew erratically for hours, officials said. After negotiators convinced him to safely come down, another pilot talked him through landing.

media.caption: The police in Tupelo, Miss., said they had been talking directly with a pilot who threatened to intentionally crash into a Walmart on Saturday morning.

results.adx_keywords: Elections, Senate;Midterm Elections (2022);United States Politics and Government;Law and Legislation;Campaign Finance;McConnell, Mitch;Trump, Donald J;Republican Party;Senate;Democratic Party
results.title: With Midterms Looming, McConnell’s Woes Pile Up
results.abstract: The minority leader who takes pride in his status as the “grim reaper” of his rivals’ agenda has allowed Democrats to claim policy victories as his party’s hopes of reclaiming the Senate dim.

media.caption: Senator Mitch McConnell, the minority leader, and a bloc of Republicans in Congress believe they need to win back suburban voters by supporting issues with broad political appeal.
media.copyright: Pete Marovich for The New York Times

results.title: A Fair Auctioned a Beloved Goat. Its Owners Filed a Federal Lawsuit.
results.abstract: A Northern California woman said her young daughter bonded with a goat named Cedar that she was caring for. Sheriff’s deputies hauled it away to slaughter.

media.caption: Cedar the goat before the Shasta District Fair livestock auction.

results.title: More Than 14,000 Strollers Recalled After Child’s Fingertip Is Amputated
results.abstract: Only one case has been reported involving an UPPAbaby All-Terrain RIDGE Jogging Stroller, the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission said.

media.caption: Owners of UPPAbaby All-Terrain RIDGE Jogging Strollers are encouraged to stop using them and contact the manufacturer to get free replacement brake discs.

results.title: How a Record Cash Haul Vanished for Senate Republicans
results.abstract: The campaign arm of Senate Republicans had collected $181.5 million by the end of July — but spent 95 percent of it. A big investment in digital, and hyperaggressive tactics, have not paid off.

results.title: Trump Embraces Conspiracy Theories He Only Winked at Before
